name: Vulpoid Biofactory
desc: A specialized biofactory that's been engineered to grow Vulpoids, a genetically-engineered lifeform capable of performing basic labor or serving as a personal companion. Due to their classification as AI by the Domain Vulpoids are considered illegal in most of the Sector, though Hegemony tech inspections are typically more concerned with true AI cores. Like a conventional biofactory, it requires habitable conditions to reliably gestate its Vulpoid workforce.
